topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a798b263687275efa80300#post_54a798b263687275efa80300
That's another thing. Call me weird but I'm not into emulated games.
I like playing them on the original hardware with it's flaws and whatnot.

[spoiler]This is why I don't play Playstation 1 games on PS3 for instance, since it's only an emulator. (That and having to hook up my PS3 with RGB to my PVM when I already use HDMI) Heck, I don't even play them on my PS2 since I wanted a reason to have a PS1 as well since I'm into collecting and such. (Besides, I believe the drive read speed might be faster, I at least recall a fuction to turn it to fast in the BIOS)[/spoiler]
topics.author: 5012e49c7f123b4012000341
